players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie was killed by the mafia, and Diana is one of them."
Diana: "I'm innocent, I swear. Don't kill me."
Bob: "Charlie was killed by the mafia, and Diana is one of them. I'm going to vote to kill Alice."
You: "I don't trust Bob, I think he's the mafia. We should vote to kill him instead."
